ExpertSystem.model

Class Fact

  • java.lang.Object
    • ExpertSystem.model.Fact

  • public class Fact
extends java.lang.Object

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected static class  Fact.Implication
      The implication of a rule: NONE : This rule does not directly imply a change to sentencing BASE : This rule implies a certain base sentence MULTI: This rule implies a multiplication to a base sentence ADD : This rule implies an addition to a base sentence SUB : This rule implies a subtraction from a base sentence

      Fact(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String value)
      Constructor Sets the name and value variables from the input, sets implication to NONE as default

        public Fact.Implication getImplication()

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.String name,
                      java.lang.String value)
        Overloaded Method Ascertains whether this fact is equal to a fact consisting of two given strings. Since all other member variables are derived from the two input strings, and cannot be externally modified no other comparisons are required.
        Parameters:
        name - The name variable of a fact
        value - The value variable of a fact
        Returns:
        True if the fact matches this one, false otherwise

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        True if the fact matches this one, false otherwise
